hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path of #the hero#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Lower Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Maze Path Third Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #the Market#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Phantom Ganon# holds...^ #a Strength Upgrade# and #a Blue Rupee#.

hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Statue Room Hand Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Center Skulltula Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to the #Goron Ruby#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a #generic grotto#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Queen Gohma# holds...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #House of Twins#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #3# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: No matter what happens...Do not give up, do not complain, and do NOT stay up all night playing!

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to the #Fire Medallion#.

ToT (Left).text: If you see something suspicious, bomb it!
